column4: This is very interesting. So Linux can read the file systems but Windows cannot, how does this effect a business if they wanted to go opensource?
it's one of the smaller problems businesses face if they want to go open source
so most businesses that use linux servers still have to use Windows based domain controllers?
the ones I've seen export nfs to the linux boxes and samba to the windows ones, and do something frightful to keep the user stuff synchronized...
